attributes.action: Make the A505 safer by Closing cut though lanes on the A505 Royston to Baldock
attributes.background: There so many car crashes on the A505  people crossing the lanes to get to the other villages on the other side! There is a 70 mph speed limit and many just take their chances that they will cross in time ! Yesterday someone didn't now my hubby has a Broke his back in 2 places !

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The A505 is the responsibility of Hertfordshire County Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Hertfordshire County Council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

https://cmis.hertfordshire.gov.uk/hertfordshire/petitions.aspx
